en: Jesús Tecú Osorio's Footage of Rabinal, Guatemala (title)| https://txarchives.org/hrdi/finding_aids/00006.xml (uri)
Agua Fria and Rio Negro / community meeting in Tempisque / Memorial for Rio Negro massacre / Religious procession, part 2 of 2

May contain graphic and/or disturbing content. Footage date-stamped 5 March 1997 from a gathering of people in a wooden building. Footage date-stamped 6 March 1997 of an undeveloped hilly area. Two voices behind the camera, one belonging to Carlos Chen Osorio, describe the situation [not logged] as the camera zooms in on people walking through the grass and a building in the distance. Footage date-stamped 13 March 1997 of a large group of people gathered in a hilly area. Footage date-stamped 28 March 1997 of a religious procession. Footage date-stamped 29 March 1997 of a dead man in an open casket.| A/D flag: analog; Copy of original. Original signal format: NTSC
